attributes.action: place a health warning on all alcoholic beverages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having lost a close family friend to alcohol poisoning, I feel very strongly that a health warning that's similar to the one on tabacco should be placed on all alcohol beverages in the United Kingdom. I believe that although we can't bring back our friend it would be nice to think that this tragedy could save at least one other life.
